content:
I'm glad you're excited about your trip to Bangkok!

However, I need to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to keep track of your personal bookings or travel plans. I'm a new conversation each time you interact with me, so I don't retain any information from previous conversations.

If you need to check your Paris flight booking, I recommend checking your email or contacting the airline or travel agency you booked with to confirm the details.
